channel.title: GUIDES on ZawZaw.blog
channel.description: Recent content in GUIDES on ZawZaw.blog

item.title: GitOps in Kubernetes Handbook
item.description: A comprehensive and hands-on practical guide to building a fully automated CI/CD pipeline using GitLab CI, GitOps Argo CD, and Argo CD image updater on the Kubernetes platform

item.title: The Platform Wiki
item.description: The platform wiki is for references and short, to-the-point guides only on SRE, Platform Engineering, Linux, Cloud-native, Containerization, and Kubernetes.
